OrgName: Predictive Index, LLC. dba PI Worldwide
activities:
We provide leadership development and sales assessment tools and related consulting services to our customers.   When the assessment tools are administered to end-users (which may occur via an Internet-based software application or offline), and when we train analysts to interpret the results of the assessment tools, we receive personal information of those end-users and trainees.  This includes personal information of end-users and trainees resident in the EU.

See: www.piworldwide.com; www.ssatsurvey.com; www.picampus.com
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
